snippet: A panel in Geneva disagrees with the position of the United States that it has no obligations under a global rights treaty when operating abroad.
lead_paragraph: A panel in Geneva disagrees with the position of the United States that it has no obligations under a global rights treaty when operating abroad.

headline.main: U.S. Seems Unlikely to Accept That Rights Treaty Applies to Its Actions Abroad
